Pioneering Progress: Advocating for Experimentation in Government with Nava Labs

Jun 24, 2025

  • civictech
  • episode
  • government
  • innovation
  • experimentation
  • social science
  • philanthropy

We’re talking about experimentation in government services with two experts from Nava Labs, a philanthropically funded part of Nava PBC: Genevieve Gaudet (Director) and Martelle Esposito (Partnerships and Evaluation Manager). Learn about their approach to experimentation, leveraging data, and how they advocate for adoption.
